name: Mandibuzz
description: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.effect: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.  This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
